/statutes/usc/section/7/2013:
(a) The Secretary shall administer quality control programs.
(b) State agencies shall submit quality control reports.
/statutes/usc/section/7/2014:
**(A)** Participation in the supplemental nutrition assistance program households shall be limited to eligible participants.
**(B)** Participation in the supplemental nutrition assistance program households under a State law shall receive additional treatment.
**(C)** Households receiving benefits must meet all reporting requirements.
/statutes/usc/section/7/2015:
(o) Work requirements for able-bodied adults without dependents are established by this subsection.
(1) Implementation rules are set by the Secretary.
